page.title: 05KIRKHOLT - A SURVEY (CONT)
page.content:
2) A lower proportion of employers and managers (3.4 compared 11.3 percent) {3) A higher proportion of unskilled {manual workers (9.2 compared with 7.1 {percent)} 4) More unemployed, previously working in manufacturing industries (40.1 percent) {5) A high proportion of households {without a car (70.5 percent compared {with 48.6 percent)
There is a high rate of unoccupied houses compared with other estates in Rochdale. Empty properties on Kirkholt are badly vandalised, and in many cases are left in a poor state by outgoing tenants abandoning them. Of the 2,288 homes, 888 owed rent totalling Â£84,745 in February 1985.
